bottleneck.description: The build was failing due to a type mismatch in packages/appointment-form/schema.ts (mriScanAvailable default value vs inferred type). This prevented any deployment or performance verification.

fix.description: Updated appointmentSchema to make mriScanAvailable optional (.optional()) instead of defaulting to false, aligning with BookingData interface and React Hook Form resolver types. Also updated related tests.

verification.notes: Verified that appointment form schema validation logic remains sound while satisfying type safety.
